channel.title: How to add castle wars?
channel.description: How to add castle wars? Help please.

item.title: How to add castle wars?
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

I can help you alil but im not very good at coding so you will have to do the rest, and Dont copy ‘n’ paste, Its NOT finished, But its something like:
if Object.is.Equal.To(“saradomin portal object ID here”)
teletoX = sarawaitingroom Xcoord;
teletoY = sarawaitingroom Ycoord;
(some timer code here, idk the code)
if Timer.Time.is.Equal.to(“howlongyouhavetowait”) // dunnno bout this, but atleast im trying!! =|
TeletoX = SaradominStartingpoint Xcoord;
TeletoY = saradominStartingPoint Ycoord;
}
if.Object.Is.Equalto(“Bandaid table”)
addItem(“Bandaid,food,anythingthatheals item ID”)
}
if.Object.is.Equalto(“Saradominstartingpoint Door/portal thing object ID”)
TeletoX = outsidethatdoorportalthing Xcoord;
TeletoY = outsidethatDoorportalthing Ycoord;
}
(you get the rest,)
(the Flag thing would be like:)
if.Object.Is.Equalto(“zammyflagpost ID”) && Saradominteam(); //something like that
Additem(“Zammy banner item ID”)
Else{ sM(“You need to get the Saradomin teams Flag!”);
}
if.Object.Is.Equalto(“Saradomin flag post ID”) && player.HasItem(“zammy banner”)
sendMessage(“You got the flag back to your Castle!!”)
else(“You need to go get the Zammy banner!!!”)

Read full topic
